Tiffany cackled. "I, uh... yeah, that's different. Anyway... just, let me tell you something. Don't talk to other fat girls the way you usually talk to me, okay? We're friends, and I'm a special case. Alright?"

Jill nodded. "Okay. Can we play soccer now?"

Tiffany snapped. "Thought you forgot. We're watching a movie or something after, okay?" Jill got off of her lap and she forced herself to her feet, waddling after her tiny charge.
12212.title: Getting Called a Fatty by an 8-year-old

choices: Tiffany waddled outside to play.
Tiffany had the devious idea to let Jill play inside...
122121.content:
As Tiffany followed Jill, she slid enormous sweaty thigh past enormous sweaty thigh, butt bouncing as she approached the back door. She was so caught up in the misery of having to play a sport that her judgment was a bit askew, so that very same bouncing butt and her jumbo-jet hips collaborated to get her wedged perfectly in the opening left by the fully-opened sliding door.

"Oh, no..." she groaned, grunting as she thrust her girth in every direction. Jill was still running to the shed to fetch the soccer ball and didn't notice that the loud, slow footsteps behind her had stopped. "Come on, fatass, here? Really?" Nothing; the doorjamb had sunken into the fat of her ass too much for her to do anything. At least this had happened enough that it didn't hurt anymore. She sighed. "I guess it's better than soccer. Jill? Jill!"

The little girl turned to face the noise and shot back, looking at Tiffany's predicament with a weird sense of wonder; surely this was the first morbidly obese teenage girl she'd seen stuck in a doorway. "Tiffany? What happened?"

"I'm stuck, Jill," Tiffany said through gritted teeth as she struggled. "Your front door's... a bit wider... than this one!"

A reluctant giggle escaped Jill.

"Honey, I know it's funny, but let's please try to be mature about this?"

"Sorry," she said, "You just look like Augustus Gloop, is all."

"Being stuck in chocolate would at least be more fun," Tiffany said, giving up for a break. "God, it's hot. Maybe we can just wait for me to sweat the fat off."

Jill's face lit up. "Good idea!"

Tiffany smiled in spite of herself. "I was joking."

"Maybe if I push on your belly you'll get unstuck!"

Before Tiffany could say "Oh, honey, that's not a great idea," Jill's tiny hands reached out and sunk halfway up to her elbows into belly fat. She was audibly exerting herself, but, quite obviously, Tiffany was the heaviest thing she'd ever tried to push. She gave up quickly.

"You're heavy."

"We established that," Tiffany joked, poking her stomach and flipping her long brown hair back over her shoulder. She struggled a bit more and heard something creak, and her face lit up. "Hang on... do you know how to take the, uh, slidey door part off the non-slidey door part?"

Jill nodded as if that was a reasonable sentence for anybody to say. "Yeah... are we gonna use that go get you out? Like a crowbar?"

Tiffany laughed. "No, it's just that it'd make the hole a little bit bigger so I can get my big butt out of it. Can you do that for me? You're a bit more... mobile."

Jill quickly got to work, hitting at the sliding door where it met its track.

"Don't break it! I do wanna get paid for the day."

"I'm not gonna," Jill promised as the door came off the track and was immediately pushed over by Tiffany's blubber re-expanding to actual size. It hit the ground with a clatter as Tiffany grinned and Jill couldn't help but laugh. "That was funny."

"Yeah," Tiffany nodded, rubbing where the doorframe had cut into her. "So, you still wanna play soccer?"

Jill nodded. "Please?"
122121.title: Doo doo doo lookin' out my back door

choices: Tiffany told the truth: "I really want to get even more fat, yes."
Tiffany lied her fat ass off: "No, I just... love food, and it makes me fat."
1221212.content:
Tiffany's plump lips curled into a smile. "You know what I loved when I was your age? Babysitters who let me do stuff I normally couldn't, and kept it a secret."

"But I'm totally allowed to play soccer!"

"I know, I know, but... have you ever wanted to play soccer inside?"

Jill's eyes widened. "Mom and Dad don't want me to play sports inside."

"Well, Tiffany's the fun babysitter, and while you should totally respect your parents because they're smart, nice people, sometimes... girls just gotta have fun, right?"

"It's wanna."

"Whatever," Tiffany giggled. "I'm not going to make you do anything, Jill, I'm just saying that... if you wanted to, you have tonight to break a rule or two."

Jill's face was a battlefield of morality, but the side that wanted her to play inside had nukes. "Okay! Let me get the ball!"

"Fuck yes," Tiffany gasped when her charge was out of earshot. She fixed the door when she was safely inside and slid it shut when Jill entered with her ball. The two pushed some furniture so the living room had a lot of open space, with the couch and TV on opposite walls. Besides, there wasn't THAT much expensive shit in that particular room.

"You set up the field," she said, waddling into the kitchen. "Goal's at the couch, okay?"

"Okay!" Jill gleefully replied, bouncing her ball.

In the kitchen, Tiffany filled her fat arms to keep her on the couch for as long as possible. Snack cakes, pastries, brownies, cookies, chocolate, candy... yum. She waddled back into the living room and slowly lowered her bulk onto the middle of the couch, putting her food around her on the small space that her vast posterior left open.

Jill scratched her head. "How are you gonna be a goalie sitting down?"

Tiffany opened and slammed together her fat legs a couple of times, the smacking of her thighs booming loudly. "If you get the ball between my legs, you get a point! Okay?"

She smiled. "Okay."

Life was good for Tiffany Callahan. Jill adored her for her leniency, she got to sit on her ass while still attending to the kid, and, most importantly, she got to watch TV and shove food between her fat cheeks without having to pay attention to anything but closing her legs every once in a while. Jill did ball tricks more than she tried to score anyway. The contrast between the winner of soccer trophies and the winner of pie eating contests was a sight to behold.

After her seventh Devil Dog, she burped loudly and kept on eating.

"Ex-cayoose you!" Jill said, hands on her hips.

"Sorry," Tiffany said through her full mouth, "Excuse me!"

Jill just watched her glut herself. "Are you trying to get even more fat?"

Tiffany gulped. "Huh?"

"Some of my aunts are fat but they're all on diets. Sorry if I'm being rude, I'm just asking... are you trying to be even more than 540?"
1221212.title: I'm What You Call "Indoorsy"

choices: "Is that girl Emily who sometimes comes over also trying?"
"Are my parents helping you by buying you all the fattening food?"
12212121.content:
"I really want to get even more fat, yes." Tiffany was beet red. "I can't lie to you, honey, I'm not this big by accident."

Jill nodded. "I kinda figured from all the food."

Tiffany chuckled nervously. "Yeah." She began to shovel cookies into her face, the obese girl's version of chewing it over with Twix.

"Why?"

Fuck, she'd hoped that question didn't come. Tiffany was brash, but not one to explain to an eight-year-old what a fetish was.

"Um... because I like how I look, and how I feel, and... eating," she giggled, looking off to the side. "It's just that I'm kinda unusual."

Jill smiled. "I like you being fat too!"

Tiffany stuttered. "Really?"

"You're comfy!"

Tiffany burst out laughing. "I am. I am indeed comfy."

"So... how big are you trying to get?"

Tiffany bit her lip; 600 and 700 and 800 were all lies, but explaining the concept of becoming an infinitely fat blob to Jill also wasn't on the to-do list.

"Um, I'm not really trying to get to a certain weight, I just like... bigger."

That wasn't really an answer at all, but she'd given it with enough confidence that Jill nodded.

Then asked another horrible question.
12212121.title: Jill CAN Handle the Truth

choices: Yes
No
122121211.content:
Tiffany laughed. "No, why do you ask?"

Jill shrugged. "She's your friend and she's bigger every time I see her too."

"Nah. Emily's just lazy and has bad self-control. I mean, so do I, but... she doesn't celebrate pounds, she just refuses to burn 'em off." Right on cue, Tiffany got another Snapchat of her eating cupcakes, frosting smeared over her face, with the caption "closing time!!!!!!" She showed it to Jill. "And she really likes cupcakes."

Jill giggled. "Is she coming over tonight, too?"
122121211.title: Emily's Not a Feedee, Just a Fatty

choices: "Can we get pizza? It's dinner."
"Can I see how much you can eat? It's like a cartoon!"
12212122.content:
"No, I just... love food, and it makes me fat. They're not, like, related."

"Okay," Jill shrugged. "I just didn't know if girls who wanted to get fatter were a thing."

Tiffany turned the question over in her head. "Well, yeah, they are, but I'm... not one."

"Wait, they are?"

"Yeah," Tiffany nodded, "I have a friend, Nikki, who's one."

"Wow," Jill said, "Is she..." she backed down.

"Is she what?"

"No, it's rude."

"It's fine, Jill," Tiffany smiled.

"Is she even bigger than you then?"

Tiffany laughed. "Oh, yeah."

Jill's eyes widened. "Can I ask how much?"

"I'm not exactly sure, but she's more than six hundred and fifty by now."

Jill gasped. "That's so big!"

Some perverted jealousy twinged within Tiffany. "Yeah, it is. She wouldn't even fit in the front door." She started to eat again, shoving an entire brownie into her mouth.

"Do you think you'd ever get that big?"

Tiffany imagined herself wider, thicker, fatter, breaking the couch, filling the room.

"Yeah, probably," she shrugged, continuing to gorge herself. "My sweet tooth's a little out of control. But no matter what," she said, turning her attention back to Jill, "People have to love every pound of themselves, okay? I don't wanna see you being mean to fat girls, or to yourself if you end up looking like me or Nikki someday, okay, sweetie?"

Jill nodded, smiling. "Yeah!" She sat down on the ball. "I'm kinda tired of soccer."

Tiffany held in her sigh of relief. "Okay. Now what do you wanna do?"
12212122.title: Liar Liar Straining Booty Shorts on Fire

choices: "...can you make us dinner? I still didn't eat."
"...can we go watch TV?" And then Tiffany napped...
122121222.content:
Tiffany was red and looked back and forth. "Uh... really?"

Jill nodded. "You already ate soooo much and you don't even look full!"

"I mean, I'm not, but... really?"

"You want to eat, right?"

Tiffany smirked. "You're not wrong."

---------------------------------------------

Out of entirely different brands of enthusiasm, the girls filled the dining room table with snack food. There wasn't an exposed inch under the sea of calories. Speaking of a sea of calories, Tiffany's ass spread across two chairs as she prepared for her feast. She held out her phone to Jill. "Do me a favor?"

"Sure."

"Take a picture of me with the food?"

Jill took the phone and held it up across the table as Tiffany gave two thumbs up and a huge smile on her fat face. She took the phone back and sent the picture to Emily with the caption:

Bow down, bitch.

Tiffany put the phone aside and began to glut herself as Jill watched, giggling. See Fatty Eat, premiering this fall on Nick. Tiffany realized that, in Jill's eyes, her gluttony and obesity were so over-the-top that she had become a cartoon caricature of a gluttonous pig, and it would be offensive if, Tiffany thought as she shoveled cupcakes between her fat lips, it wasn't so goddamn true. She thought about the lie she'd told, about how she craved more fat on her frame, about growing to Nikki's size and more, more, more...

She was eating faster, now, and Jill was absolutely captivated. She was talking, but Tiffany couldn't hear. She simply ate. And ate. And ate. This was too much food, she told herself, this was more than the Jordans had expected her to eat, but she only gorged more voraciously as the naughty thought of Jill's muscular father and svelte, busty young mother calling her out on her whalehood intruded into her food-addled mind.

Her gut was swelling, pushing against her Daisy Dukes more and more with every greedy gulp. Her belly, her big belly, her big bloated belly, her big bloated blubbery belly was getting soooooo enormous...

BANG!

Tiffany had eaten most of the food when her expanding gut had broken the front of her shorts and escaped her panties and sent a flood of fat spilling out from her tank top, two flubbery spare rolls exposed and quivering. She rubbed her belly and burped, and Jill laughed.

"Tiffany, that was amazing!"

Pride was tweaked. "Was?" Tiffany grinned with another burp. "I'm clearing the table." She leaned forward and began to pig out on brownies as Jill giggled and clapped. "This is what happens," she said as she ate, "When you don't care about putting on a pound or two."

The table was empty, everything in Tiffany's ever-swelling sea of flab. "Entertained?" She burbled.

Jill nodded. "That was fun! Now..."
122121222.title: Callahan, The Cartoon Caricature of a Pig

choices: The pizza arrives and Tiffany just can't help herself...
Emily shows up just before the pizza does.
1221212221.content:
Tiffany grimaced. "Oh. Right. You didn't eat." She started to rise, but the stabbing pain in her stomach stopped her. She groaned and put her hands on her belly. "Just... gimme a minute. Go... go watch TV or something, okay?"

"Okay!" Jill shot out of the room. Tiffany rubbed her stomach slowly with both hands like a Buddha statue and took slow, deep breaths. In, out. In, out. Now that the frenzy was over, the sheer volume of food in her belly was getting to her. In, out. She shifted again, groaning with discomfort. Taking one big, brave gasp of air, she rocked back and leveraged herself to her feet with a small cry of "Holy shit!"

Tiffany leaned forward slightly, her overfull gut sticking out in front of her like a pale white dome of taut flab, hanging down over the busted front of her shorts. She took one step, fighting one enormous thunder thigh past the other, panting, groaning, whining at how much her belly hurt, knowing with every movement that it was her own greedy fault.

She entered the living room, her steps heavy.

"We're UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURP... we're ordering pizza," she burbled before throwing herself down onto the couch, belly in the air. The couch creaked.

Jill looked at her, eyebrows raised. "Are you okay?"

"Y-yeah," Tiffany groaned. "I just... forgot I ate a lot earlier too... this was... too... UUUUUUUUURP... excuse me... ugh." She dropped her arms to her sides and laughed, overfilled gut rising and falling. "Oh my god, I'm so fat. I don't think I'll be able to get off the couch all night. Let's order pizza."

Jill pouted. "But I like it when we cook together!"

Tiffany simply winded and blew like an exhausted hippo. "Honey, I have the mother of all tummyaches right now. I'll cook with you next time, but tonight we're ordering pizza, okay?"

She thought about it, then nodded, smiling. "Okay! Extra cheese?"

Tiffany's heart screamed yes but her stomach gurgled. "Of course, Jill. Extra cheese."

So Tiffany called in the order, getting two large pizzas out of instinct.
1221212221.title: Overfull Tiffany

choices: Emily shows off her glutinous side, eating most of the food.
Tiff eats more than she thought she could.
12212122212.content:
*ding dong* "Jill that must be the pizza, can you be a dear a grab it." Tiffnay had not moved from the couch since her little binge session, her belly was just too full. Jill hopped over to the door, opening it to reveal the chubby blond Emily.

"Hey little Jill! How's my favorite youngster?" Emily said in her highest pitched voice and she tossled the little girls hair.

"You look bigger than last time." Jill exclaimed looking up at the plump girls round face and double chin, past her ever so round and full melons. Emily turned an eye to Tiff who was still transfixed on the couch. All Tiff could do was shrug at the girls observational comment.

"I guess I've been eating too many cupcakes at work, or I've just been spending too much time with this eating machine you call a babysitter. Speaking of cupcakes, look what I brought." Emily reached behind her and grabbed two large boxes. "Two dozen cupcakes for us to share! Well mostly Tiff and myself, you can have like one or two ok sport."

"Might be all you Em, I'm stuffed." Tiffany moaned as she rubbed her full belly that was flowing through her busted shorts.

Their convo was cut short by a teenaged delivery boy walking up the front path. "Ooo pizza delivery boy, Emily would you be a dear." Tiffany asked. Emily took the pizzas and brought them in along with her cupcakes.

"Stuffed? I didn't think that word was in your vocabulary." Emily taunted her hefty friend.

"She just ate a table full of food like porky pig would in the cartoons!" Jill bragged for tiffany.

"Look like you two have been having fun. I guess Jill and I will have to have all this gooey pizza to ourselves." Emily opened the first box grabing a slice for both herself and Jill.

"Maybe I'll just have one..." Tiffany said, leaning forward on her big gut trying to reach the table. Her grasp fell over a foot short, Emily had to grab the slice fornher.
12212122212.title: Emily shows up just before the pizza does.

choices: Tiffany finally heaves herself to her feet and carries Jill to bed.
Emily bribes Tiffany with cupcakes; despite her fullness, Tiff can't resist!
122121222122.content:
"Tiffany, stop." Emily's voice and face were a combination of scolding a child and showing genuine concern for another human being's life. The blonde was on the floor, leaning against the wall with her arm around Jill, who was napping against Emily's soft torso. This angle only served to make Tiffany something resembling Jabba the Hutt, which... wasn't far off. With her ward asleep, Tiffany had fully exposed the blob of blubber that was her gut, rubbing it with one fat hand as she held half of a slice of pizza with the other. She was sweating and her round face was even a bit green.

"N-noo," Tiffany burped, groaning. "On a... roll... ugh." She inhaled, causing a sharp pain in her abdomen and making her gasp. She exhaled very, very slowly as she pressed on her lower belly to force out more gas. "This pizza is..." she grimaced, then bit off a huge mouthful of it, "So... good..." she chewed slowly, leaning her head back and flopping down. "Oh. Em... I think I... urp..." another bite, "Ate too much... this time..."

"Yeah, I'll say," Emily said. "You emptied this poor family's kitchen and then ate an entire large pizza by yourself. Even for you, that's... a little crazy. I'm surprised you haven't started on the cupcakes already, you pig."

Tiffany closed her eyes, took a deep breath to steel herself, then jammed the soft cheesy crust into her mouth all at once. "That sounds... bluuuurp... really good," Tiffany giggled. She swallowed and put both hands on her belly, swatting the empty pizza box off of the small part of the couch not taken up by her gigantic ass.

Emily sighed. "Something inside of me really hates that you're getting paid for this. You're the worst influence," she joked, rubbing Jill's shoulder. The girl stirred in her sleep, but didn't wake up. "Do you even fit through their front door?"

"How fat do you think I am?" Tiffany scoffed, then clutched her belly and groaned.

Emily laughed. She slowly stood up, gently laying Jill on the carpeted floor, and walked over to Tiffany, who pouted up at her.

"Oh god, don't-- UUURP-- don't fuck with me right now, I'm so full," she groaned.

"I'm not," Emily said, "Just gonna make a quick point about... width." The chubby blonde stepped to the side, turned, and slowly lowered her bubble butt onto the couch next to Tiffany's monstrous booty. Fat squished against fat, but when all the wriggling and jiggling was over, Emily was still unable to actually sit down. She stood up and crossed her arms. "See? So... do you even fit through their front door?"

"It's probably gonna turn into a struggle... oooof... turn into a struggle just in time for me to leave for college, sooo... urp... it's fine," Tiffany shrugged. Her eyes drifted to Jill on the floor. "Can you... bring her to her bed?"

Emily put her hands on her soft hips, then looked from Jill to Tiffany to Jill to Tiffany's grease-stained gut.

"No."

"Oh, come on..."

"You're the babysitter," Emily teased, holding out her arms for Tiffany to grab.

"But I'm full!"

"Exactly. Walk the gas out," Emily taunted again with a wink, leaning forward and forcefully grabbing Tiffany's chubby hands. "Come on, tubby."

Tiffany raised an eyebrow and laughed. "Go ahead, Schwarzenegger, try to lift me."

There was a brief twinge of fear in Emily's eye. "I will."

"All my weight, plus like... what, seven pounds of food sloshing around in my belly?" Tiffany laughed. "Have fun paralyzing yourself."

Emily sighed and let go of Tiffany's arms. "Okay, then, you leave me no choice."

"You know by now that my big butt is just a symbol of my complete refusal to-- UPH!" Tiffany stopped mid-sentence as Emily pressed her hand hard against Tiff's belly. "Oh GOD that ffffffffucking hurts," she squeaked, trying to balance the pain with not swearing in front of Jill. Emily took two big handfuls of Tiffany's bottom belly roll and sloshed the fat up and down, forcing two consecutive burps out of Tiffany. "Stop jiggling meeeeee," she whined, too fat to sit up and reach Emily and her flab-drowned arms too weak to shove Emily's hands away.

"Only way to stop me is to get up," Emily said matter-of-factly, going back to pushing on her belly.
122121222122.title: Full, Like FULL Full

choices: Tiffany, ever the sweet tooth, relents and does her job.
Tiffany licks her lips. "No."
1221212221222.content:
"UUUUUUURP this is... BLURP... actually starting to feel... ugh... good," Tiffany laughed as Emily continued to abuse her blubber-coated abdomen, forcing gas out less painfully than it had been before. Emily, a bit out of breath, stopped.

"You're so heavy that even that was a workout," Emily groaned, stretching and briefly exposing some of her own chubby belly. "I guess you're welcome for the belly rub."

"I feel a lot less nauseous," Tiffany giggled, less green now. "Thanks, girl."

"Wasn't the intention," Emily frowned, looking around for ideas when her eyes fell on the boxes of cupcakes. An evil grin emerged on her chubby face like a whale cresting above the ocean. "It sounded like that gas freed up a lot of room, huh?"

Tiffany's eyes followed Emily's gaze and fell on the pastel pink boxes across the room, and in that moment the enormous feedee knew she'd lost. But, much like every time she'd been kicked out of a buffet for wardrobe malfunctions, she wasn't going out without a fight.

"No... Emily, I've eaten... soooooo much tonight..." she gave her gut three big, heavy slaps to force out a slightly pathetic burp, "I can't... I really can't. I'm tapping out of this food fight." As she spoke, Emily made her way to the cupcakes, grabbed a box, and returned to Tiffany, opening it.

"Hmm... no. See, Tiff, you quit a lot of things... track, when you realized 'fat girl running' wasn't funny enough to justify exercise... dieting, back in the dark days when you did that... every relationship you've ever had with a non-feeder... but eating?" She stuck her finger into the box and it came out covered in pink frosting. "Nah. You just need some motivation."

"Oh, but I'm soooo full," Tiffany said. She was a great eater but a shitty actress. "I think it's... food coma time..." She closed her eyes and opened her mouth to yawn, and in the darkness she felt Emily's finger press down against her tongue, her taste buds picking up the sweetness. On reflex, she closed her mouth and worked her magic until the finger came out clean.

Emily smirked, holding a cupcake. "Ready to stand up?"
1221212221222.title: Emily bribes Tiffany with cupcakes

choices: Two Weeks, Two Jobs, Too Fat
The first day of Two-Job Tiff
12212122212222.content:
She giggled greedily: "I don't think so, Em. I'm feelin' a bit peckish. You gotta feed me those cupcakes first."

Emily groaned in frustration: "Come ON, Tiff, we both know once you eat 'em all, you'll be too bloated to move." She groaned... "UGH ok fine, I'll make you a deal. take Jill to bed, and I'll bring the other box of cupcakes I have in the car. I was saving 'em for myself, but I'll give them to you if you just do your job. Jeez."

Tiffany's eyes widened and she slowly rubbed her gargantuan gut, licking her lips: "Ya mean that? All for me?"

"Yes, fatso, all for you. 36 rich, heavy cupcakes slathered in creamy, sweet frosting," Emily continued wickedly "One after another stuffed into that gut of yours. Every one making you bigger and fatter." Emily crossed her arms under her impressive bosom, "but if you don't get up soon...I'm gonna start eating 'em...mmmmm" She slowly started walking toward the boxes.

That was enough for Tiffany: "Alright, don't tell me anymore, I'm goin!!" She started rocking herself up, the mountain of food packed into her stomach sloshing and burbling around and making it even more difficult than usual. Tiffany finally got to her feet, and unsteadily swayed, a residual burp escaping from her exertions: "BLURP!!! oooff, I think I ate more than I thought. What a weight!" Scooping the snoozing Jill in a fluid motion, Tiffany slowly lumbered to her bedroom and gently tucked her in. She was a little tyke, and a sweet one at that.

Jill murmured and opened her eyes a crack: "mmmm...Tiffany...can we do that more often? That was funnn. *yawnn"

"Do what, sugarcube?" Tiffany gasped, slightly winded from even that minor task, her massive fat all aquiver.

Jill giggled: "hehehehe, watch you eat. That was more fun than cartoons...mmm night Tiff." With that the little lassie rolled over onto her side and fell into the happy sleep that seemed to be the sole province of young children. Tiff on the other hand was VERY awake and VERY excited? Eat like that every time she came over? Get paid to stuff her face? Make everyone happy? Heck yeah! Congratulating herself on the luck of finding this job, Tiffany waddled back down to the living-room, where true to her word, Emily had set up the three boxes of cupcakes all ready to be glutted.

Collapsing yet again on the poor tortured chair, Tiffany winked at the slightly off-put Emily, "aw don't look so down, Em. You're gonna be workin' there all summer. I'm sure you'll have more opportunities to nick more than enough to keep ya happy." Tiffany grinned greedily and shoved an entire cupcake into her mouth, joy creasing her fat face at the rich flavor.

"Not if I keep being friends with you, I think" Emily grumbled half to herself as she watched cupcake after cupcake disappear into Tiff's nearly bottomless maw and gorged into her impossibly superswollen stomach. Despite the space freed by Emily's enjoyable burping session earlier, Tiffany still had to struggle quite a bit to force all 36 cupcakes down, but as usual, she tackled this new feast with unrequited greed and gluttony, seeming to enjoy pushing herself further and further beyond what she believed to be her limits. Finally, FINALLY, she glutted the last one down with a triumphant hiccup, and collapsed back on the couch, both hands limply plopped on the gargantuan swell of her supremely overgorged belly.

"URRRPP...ohh...ohh mann those are...HICC...those are goood...hey, anytime you guys got...BLURP...extras, feel free to kick 'em my way..ughhhhh" Tiffany clutched the flanks of her stupidly gorged stomach and relished the feeling of cramming feast on top of feast on top of feast. The now over 8 pounds of food bubbling in the vat of her stomach squelched richly, and Tiffany couldn't have enough.

Emily, however, tapped her temple thoughtfully: "You know, Tiff, my manager was just talking about how sad it was to throw away all our extras. We're a profitable shop, of course, but we still have plenty of baked goods that we just don't end up selling, and everyone knows you can't let 'em just sit there for days on end. Tell you what, I'll chat tomorrow and see if I can set up a part-time gig for you to take care of that problem."

Tiffany looked up, shocked and euphoric: "HIC....wait ya mean that? You'd do that for me? really?" Emily nodded and Tiff was so happy she could burst "I could kiss you right now. Man Imma get...URRP...Imma get SO fat...."
12212122212222.title: Tiffany licks her lips. "No."

choices: Emily makes an appearance, and she's bigger than ever
Tiffany tells Jill her real motives
122121222122221.content:
It had been two weeks since that fateful babysitting night, and Emily had pulled through with getting Tiffany the second job at the bakery. Her manager after taking one look at Tiffany offered her the role of eating their left overs. Since doing that was like getting paid she would have to do it for free, but Tiffany didn't care, and was actually excited. So seven days a week around 5 o clock she would stop by the bakery and pick up all their left over, or have Emily deliver them to her.

She kept her baby sitting gig as well. As much as Jill wanted Tiffany to run around with her, Tiffany couldn't help but care for the little squirt. Plus Jill loved her new favorite reality TV show, watching Tiffany eat more and more food.

Jill's parents noticed the lack of food in their house recently, especially now that Tiffany was baby sitting more and more, but they were OK with it since Jill loved her babysitter and they called on her all the time.

And Tiffany loved this most of all. She got to pig out on cupcakes everyday, and eat a feast of junk food with Jill all the time. She was taking in more calories than ever and her scale was slowly climbing towards that 600 lb milestone.

"Tiffany, mommy went shopping today, I helped her pick out your favorites!" Little Jill exclaimed the moment Tiffany arrived for her baby sitting shift.

"What a good little helper you are!" Tiffany replied.

"Brownies are still your favorite, right?" Jill asked to make sure, not wanting to disappoint her obese care taker.

"They still are this week." Tiffany goggled. "But I like all things sugary, so sometimes that changes. But since you bought em, where are they?" Jill lead Tiffany into the kitchen and showed her the cubbard the brownies had been stashed in. Tiffany grabbed two boxes and started in on them. After the first bite she let out a subtle moan.

"I made sure she bought a lot!"

"Good girl" Tiffany verbally rewarded her little enabler. After the two boxes were cleaned out she went back for two more.

Tiffany had already made her stop by the bakery today and cleared them out, eating most of the stash on the way over, and the rest before she had left while she was talking to Emily as her shift was ending. So these brownies were just getting piled on top of the sugar pile that was already digesting in her belly.

"Are you the size of your other friend now?" Tiffany heard Jill ask as she was just taking another hoggish bite into a brownie.

"Which one? The one I told you about the other day? The one who is trying to get fatter?"

"Yes" the little one said plainly.

Tiffany laughed. "No not yet."

"It's just that you look bigger. Like fatter than I've seen you before."

"Well I'm pretty sure I am." Tiffany told her. "I've been eating a lot lately."

"And your shorts don't fit." Jill pointed at the large girls waist, something Tiffany wasn't really able to see. But Jill was right, Tiffany had been unable to button the largest pair of shorts she , so she just left the flaps open and let her humongoua ass and chunky lega hold them up.

"Yeah when you get fat you some times have wardrobe malfunctions." Her shirt also didn't fit her, allowing much of her exposed belly to jiggle is the hot summer air, but Jill had gotten used to seeing this and loved being able to witness the efforts of her gorging baby sitter.

Jill had been having a blast watching Tiffany pack away a family's worth of food these past two weeks, and tonight was going to be no different as she was already getting started.

"This is going to be so awesome!" said Emily, hauling her bags into the trunk of the car. These days, Emily only ever seemed to have one outfit that fit her, and she wasn't wearing it today. Her denim short shorts looked like they were painted on her growing bubble-butt, her thighs escaping from the bottom of them like dough, and they were unbuttoned to free her jiggling belly, which sat in two rolls, but didn't extend as far as her impressive breasts, which filled out a red and white spotted halter top better than ever.

The two girls were taking their vacation in Emily's dad's old station wagon, which was pretty crappy but at least the front bench seats were wide enough for a certain enormous ass to spread out. Tiffany settled into the passenger seat and as the suspension groaned she pulled out a paper sack full to the brim with chocolate and started snacking. Tiffany was eve less likely to find clothes that fit than Emily. She was wearing stretchy green booty shorts that only covered half her enormous ass and were almost covered by her lower belly roll and back-fat, while her gut flopped forward onto her thighs, her tight white t-shirt bunching up under her large, round tits. She leaned over and honked the horn as Emily hurried round the car and settled into the driver's seat.

A few short months ago, her response on seeing Tiffany starting in on a few dozen enormous slabs of milk chocolate would have elicited a "Jesus, Tiff!" from Emily, but things were different now. Not only could a person only be surprised by Tiffany's seemingly limitless capacity for stuffing her fat face for so long, but these days Emily was a pretty unapologetic glutton herself. She reached out and grabbed a bar of chocolate, munching on it as they pulled out of their quiet suburban street and headed for the open road.

A little while later, they were cruising along the freeway and Tiffany had scarfed down the last of the chocolate. Crumpling up the bag in one fat fist, she stifled a belch and asked, "So where we gonna stop for lunch?"

"We had breakfast right before we left," said Emily mildly, adjusting the sunglasses on her freckled nose.

"Well, they won't know that," grinned Tiffany. "Those little roadside diners won't know what hit 'em!"

"I was thinking about a buffet," said Emily. "Once we get outside of a ten-mile radius, we might be able to find somewhere you're not banned from. Should be any time now, we just passed the exit where that place is – you know, the one where you pulled your chair up to the make-your-own-sundae bar and they ended up calling the cops?"

"That was a big misunderstanding," said Tiffany, her colossal stomach rumbling. "Oh, man, I haven't been to a real buffet in forever. Maybe we should eat all our meals all-you-can-eat on this trip. It can be like our thing, we don't get up from a table until we're FULL."

"Fine by me," said Emily, patting her own smaller but still impressive stomach rolls. "I'm telling you, Tiff, this is the summer I blimp. When I get home, my parents are gonna be like, Who are you and why did you eat our daughter?"

"And I'll say, because she wouldn't pull over and let me have my damn lunch!" said Tiffany. "Look, there's a rest stop coming up in a couple miles, can we please get something to eat there?"

"Hmm," said Emily...

1231.content:
The two girls pulled into the rest stop parking lot and Emily waited patiently while Tiffany hauled herself from the car with much profanity and creaking of suspension. They waddled towards the door, passing a sign in the window advertising "All-You-Can-Eat Breakfast at the Road Fuel Diner!"

As Tiffany thundered in through the double doors, all the diners and staff turned round to stare at her, while Emily, complete with gut hanging out of her shorts, was barely noticed at all. Twenty pairs of eyes followed the vast, swaying booty that made its way to a booth by the window and the belly that squeezed itself between the seats and the table. A frizzy-haired waitress hurried over, chewing her lip. "Uh, can I help you with something?" she said, not even reaching for her order pad, as if she hoped that they had wandered in by mistake, looking for the local hippo sanctuary.

"Yeah, is the all-you-can-eat breakfast still happening?" Tiffany asked, her enormous tummy grumbling loudly.

All remaining color drained from the server's face. "Uh, no." She shifted uncomfortably. "That – it's over now."

"Really? Then why does that sign behind you say it lasts until noon?" Emily asked innocently.

The waitress slumped, resigned to the huge financial hit the business was about to take. "What can I get you?" she asked dully.

Tiffany took a deep breath, her gigantic bosom heaving and wobbling. "I want double helpings of everything in the breakfast menu, and I want it on a bed of bacon. I don't want to be able to see that plate when I could be seeing bacon instead, got it?"

"And the same for me," smiled Emily. "Oh, and we'll both have extra-large chocolate milkshakes." As the waitress shuffled off, defeated, Emily took out her road map and spread it out on the table between them. "I was thinking about the route," she said. "It'll take about three or four days to get to my cousin's college, then I thought maybe we could drive down the coast."

"Awesome," said Tiffany distractedly, looking around at all the other diners' food. "I totally wanna hit the beach, like, as soon as possible."

Emily froze. "Oh, uh – really?"

"Yeah," said Tiffany. "What's the point in having a body like this if you can't show it off in a scandalously tiny bikini?" She raised her arms and shimmied, making the bench creak underneath her and every inch of her body, from her double chin and pillowy arms to her avalanche of gut and tree-trunk thighs quiver in response. It took some time for her to stop shaking, but when Emily didn't respond, realisation dawned on Tiffany's plump face. "Oh, I get it! You haven't worn a bikini since you started to get fat, right?"

"I'm not sure..." Emily said. "Hey, shouldn't our food be here by now?"

"Oh, come on, Em, don't puss out on me now," said Tiffany. "I thought you were in this for the long haul! What about how this is gonna be your big fat summer?"

"Well, it doesn't matter anyway, I didn't bring a swimsuit," said Emily, folding her arms under her considerable bust.

"Good thing there are like a thousand clothing stores between here and the ocean," said Tiffany stubbornly. "I'm sure some of them will have something than fits a little piggy like you."

Emily was about to open her mouth to respond when the waitress returned, struggling with their enormous mountains of fried breakfasty goodness. "Here you go," she sighed. "Is that everything?"

Tiffany laughed through a mouthful of hash-browns. "Oh, I don't think so," she said, spearing a juicy sausage with her fork. "You've got a lot of work ahead of you." She smiled a gluttonous smile at Emily, and another at her food. "This vacation is gonna be awesome."

“Come on Tiff, seriously?” Emily practically begged of her co-pilot as they drove past the sign indicating another all you can eat buffet only a short distance further.
“You bet skinny!” exclaimed Tiffany, clapping her hands from excitement “we said we were going ‘all you can eat’ style this trip and that’s our next stop”
Emily begrudgingly fixated on a single spot on the road whilst chewing her lip, ignorant of the fact she was rubbing her exposed stomach at the thought of more food.
“Come on, don’t wuss out on the second stop” teased Tiffany with a gentle poke to Emily’s bulging hip.
“Urgh, fine” groaned Emily, apparently having decided just in time to take the exit for the buffet as her stomach started to growl.

*************

“Ohhh, this place smells so good!” squeals Tiffany as the road trippers walked towards their new feasting spot.
Emily followed slightly behind, pulling the tight wedgie from between her arse cheeks before trotting to Tiffany’s side and rolling her eyes.
“You say that everywhere we go” chastised Emily whilst trying to ignore the fact she was starting to salivate quite strongly from the thick aromas meeting the girls.
“Well we both know you love it too Em” mused Tiffany as her hand reached the door handle.
Emily’s cheeks started to burn slightly at being caught out, damn that brunette cow and dragging her down to her fat food addicted level.
The blondes’ mild annoyance quickly faded though as the door was pushed open.

With a distinctly western theme, the diner the two girls entered was bristling with activity. With cowboys and girls milling around serving customers and a multitude of beautiful smells following them, Tiffany and Emily stood in the door in food ecstasy.
“Hey there ladies, can I get you’s a seat?” chirped a voice in front of them.
Snapped out of their trances, the two growing girls glanced forward to take in their hostess.
Standing slightly taller than the prospective customers before her, the stereotypically dressed cowgirl was clad in a checked shirt tied up beneath her boobs and denim shorts not too dissimilar from Emily’s. She was also sporting a pair of leather boots and a matching wide brimmed hat. Her sheriff badge styled name tag tipped the girls off that their waitress was called Casey.
“Wow, girls that spaced must be starving, let’s get you a table and some burgers to get you started and we’ll order in a moment” smiled Casey, taking Tiffany and Emily by a hand each and took them to an empty table.
In moments, the two travellers were seated, comfortable and had a plate of sliders pushed in front of each of them.
“Just give me a shout when you’re ready for some real food” winked Casey, walking off with a swing in her hips to deal with another table.
Still bemused at this place, Emily looked at Tiffany with confusion painted over her face
“Sliders as a starter?” quizzed the much smaller blonde, although an answer was less than forth coming as Tiffany was already diving in.
Overcome by the smell and apparently practically starving again, Emily shrugged and took to her own plate.

*************

“Well I’m glad to see you settling in here” chimed in Casey on her return to the table.
‘Sliders as a starter’ looked to be a slight underestimation in reflection as Emily swallowed the last bite of burger, a hand on her distended stomach with small shallow breaths heaving her chest rhythmically.
Despite her size advantage, Tiffany was also looking fuller than she’d expect with something of a glutted smile on her face.
“So ladies, what shall we have today?” enquired the bubbly waitress, with a hand on one hip.
“Could you just give us a sec? We haven’t had chance to check the menu” muttered Emily with something of a forced smile.
“Not a problem, I’ll be back in a moment” chirped Casey again before turning on her booted heels.
Checking over her shoulder that Casey had got out of earshot, Emily forced herself to sit up fully before addressing Tiffany.
“I don’t know about you babe but I think I’m...” started the blonde but was promptly cut off by her eating partner.
“I love this place Em, there’s so many choices, I don’t know what to go for” screeched Tiffany, pawing over the glossy menu a page at a time.
“Don’t you think we’ve over...” Emily tried again but was quickly brushed aside by Tiffany’s continued excitement.
“Oh. My. God! They have eating challenges! How amazing would that be for starting our journey?” At this point Tiffany was so excited her belly was jiggling.
Emily sighed before grumbling “pretty sure we started at breakfast Tiff...”
Before the attempting maturity blonde could go further with her point, Casey returned to the table, notepad at the ready.
“You need any more time or we about ready to go?” asked the waitress, flicking her blonde curls over her shoulder as she spoke.
Emily looked over at Tiffany in dismay before sighing again and scoffing, waving her compliance with a fatal flick of the wrist.
“We are definitely ready and we would like...”

***************

The girls continued chatting and scrolling through their phones before they were interrupted by the squeak of a serving trolleys wheels getting gradually louder as it made its way towards their booth.
In sync, Tiffany and Emily looked towards the sound and were both blown away at what they saw.
Heading their way was Casey pushing a poor trolley before her loaded with the list of food that Tiff had just outlined in duplicate and fit for two.

“Here you go ladies, two ‘All American Dreams’ coming up” chirped the never wavering waitress as she heaved the plates onto the table.

“Ummmm” moaned Emily across from her as she swallowed “it’s so good!” With a piece of burger in one hand and a piece of fried chicken in the other, the sceptic Emily had completely disappeared as gluttony took hold.

UUUUURP! Tiffany let loose a huge belch from the depths of a stomach, leading the girls to laugh as best they could without stopping the gastric onslaught they were both on.

With hands empty, Emily swept up her pitcher of milkshake and put the glass to her lips before tipping it gently to allow the liquid to glide into her mouth.
The fluid was surprisingly thick but the intense creamy vanilla flavour was to die for as the blonde girl drank deeply, inhaling thick globs of the sweet drink.

Over the top of the pitcher Tiffany could be seen grabbing at fries and chicken as it rapidly disappeared into her mouth, leading Emily to think that her friend might even finish the challenge. They were about half way through their time, leaving about an hour left and Emily suddenly became aware that, as she glanced at her own plate, she might even finish the damm thing.

Feeling milkshake building up in her stomach, the blonde suddenly became aware of her shorts pinching sharply into her swelling gut prompting her to fiddle for her button, without stopping drinking for a second, and twisting the metal stud through the restrictive denim...

No doubt helped by the continuous pouring of milkshake, Emily’s swelling stomach surged forward as her button came loose, peeling her shorts down and the lower bulge of stomach perched gently on her thighs. The sudden movement in her stomach wrenched a burp through her lips, provoking a smile and breaking her drink making her put the pitcher down and dive into the meat again with new vigor without her restrictive shorts.

***************

Across from the rapidly expanding blonde was Tiffany who was not holding back by any stretch of the imagination. With only a quarter of her burger and a few fries left over she looked set to destroy this food challenge. However, she was facing something of a logistical problem that a simple button pop couldn’t fixed.

As a much bigger girl from the offset, Tiffany was now fighting with her enormous stomach pressed against the table edge. Although only slight, the table was causing some discomfort and the pressure was causing a bulge of fat to crimp above and below the solid edge in front of her and, most frustratingly it was hampering her eating at this point.

Taking a moment to glance at Emily, who had covered her shirt in grease drippings and had left a telling greasy handprint on her thigh where she’d missed wiping it on her shorts, Tiff smiled to herself. To think Emily had argued against this decision.

Unwilling to be defeated by a table, Tiff took to desperate measures and, after some wiggling and a forceful upward lift with her arms the brown haired bombshell heaved her belly on top of the table. To little surprise, Tiffany had conquered the challenge, albeit barely as she was still licking her fingers clean as Casey walked to the booth. Not a scrap was left on her plate as she idly massaged a roll of belly fat with a now clean hand with a glazed smile on her face.

With a single piece of chicken, a handful of fries and some remnants of burger meat and bacon dripped in cheese scattered around her plate the much smaller blonde had outdone herself. Heavily distended and protruding from her naturally chubby hips, Emily was laid back cradling a ball of grease and meat and groaning under her breath, stifling weak burps and grimacing in discomfort.

1511.content:
It all started because Tiffany had been having too much fun. Someone weighing in at five hundred and thirty pounds should try not to jam too hard to music while driving, especially when said car is not particularly big and sturdy enough to resist all the literal rocking while in motion. Or, even more so, steer clear away from the suburban street's corner sewer lines. Some of those sewer grates were open, making those particular ones an easy trap for any driver veering too close, and thus risking a busted tire.

Yet what happened to Tiffany seemed to be an act of sheer misfortune. Too distracted was she by her favorite music, she didn't notice she had started to veer close to an open sewer grate. Too deep in high spirits she was, she didn't even realize she was shaking the foundations of her car with her aggressive movements in tune to the song. It all lead to the inevitable.

Tiffany's jamming came to a screeching halt upon feeling her car sink on one end, followed by a violent jerk forward of both herself and the car, and then the telltale signs of hard rubber scrapping and rupturing. And then, at the exact same time, something akin to a nasty cough erupted from the front of her car, which was quickly followed by a surge of smoke shooting out of the hood, and then her car stopping completely.

"What the fuck...?" Tiffany gaped once the shock had passed. She threw her door open and stepped out to survey the damage. "Oh my god, are you kidding...?!"

She didn't think it was possible, and yet it had actually happened. The upper right tire of her car was already deflated, the material oozing on the street pavement. Her car must have jerked forward while she still had her foot on the accelerator, because now the lower right tire was stuck in the open sewer grate. And finally, Tiffany didn't need to be a mechanic to know that the black smoke shooting from her car's front hood meant the engine was completely dead. Opening it up (getting smoke on her face in the process) and giving it a quick look determined that she would be lucky if it could be repaired; the engine looked very busted.

"Well, fuck me," Tiffany groused, giving the vehicle an ineffective kick. "You piece of junk, why do this to me now? Flat tire I could take, but broken engine and stuck? UGH! Just whyyyyyyyyyyy?!"

"Hey, are you okay?!"

Tiffany paused in her self-pitying, remembering she had been driving around a suburban neighborhood, and her car had broken down in front of a suburban resident's house. Suburban folk don't take kindly to car troubles from strangers outside their homes.

"Shit," Tiffany muttered, before pivoting around to face the woman. "Sorry, ma'am! I, uh, just had a little accident--"

"Wait... Tiffany? Tiffany Callahan?!"

The brunette blinked, her apology forgotten as she took in the woman standing by the wide door frame of her house. And who seemed to know her.

She was big, like about as big as her. Actually, she looked to be maybe twenty pounds fatter. She was huge all over, most prominently in her belly and...wow, that was quite an ass. She was dressed in simple black leggings that looked to be on the breaking point in containing those flabby legs, and a white t-shirt that was doing a decent job in containing that belly and those impressive tits.

But then Tiffany focused on the distinguishing traits of the woman. Light skin, a warm face framed with fat jowls and a double chin that was clearly evolving into a triple, long raven hair that flowed past her shoulders and probably down her back, and deep, beautiful blue eyes.

Realization instantly struck her.

"Oh my god, Taylor?!" Tiffany squealed, a broad grin stretching her fat cheeks to dimples.

"It is you!" the fatter, older woman was just as happy to see her. She held her massive, wobbly arms wide. "C'mere, you!"

Tiffany wasted no time, waddling at a pace that betrayed her true size before all but throwing herself at the other woman, their massive forms colliding and jiggling like a moving ocean wave as a wet SMACK ensued from their bellies smashing together. They cooed and squealed as they threw their arms as much over the other as they could, embracing tightly.

"Oh gawd, it's been a while--"

"Since BBWCon way back--"

"And that trip to Glut Burger afterwards--"

"You, me, and Abby, and those other ladies--"

A shrill sound of joy from both women as they babbled and held each other tighter before finally pulling apart.

"So what brings you to these parts?" Taylor asked, looking past Tiffany to glance at the broken car.

The brunette winced. "Car trouble. It's, uh, pretty bad. Sorry about that, y'know, right in front of your house..."

"Ah, don't worry about it," Taylor waved, smiling with empathy. "Life gives you lemons, and all that."

"Or, in our case, pizza," Tiffany grinned cheekily, rubbing a playful hand on the older woman's belly.

"I was about to order some before your fatass came literally crashing down my front lawn," Taylor slapped the brunette's belly in equal playfulness. "Great thing, too. Rob's away on business, and he won't be back until the end of the week, so it's been lonely here."
